account.delete-fail: china chinalakwika, ndodomeko yanu siyinafufutidwe mwathunthu
account.delete-success: Akaunti yanu yafufutidwa. Mutha kutuluka tsopano

create-account.introduction: Kuti mupange nambala mufunika kumaliza izi
create-account.unequal-passwords: Nambala yachinsinsi yomwe munapanga yasiyana. Chonde yesaniso
create-account.username-not-unique: Dzina lanu lomwe munalemba ndi la wamba. Chonde yesaniso
create-account.username-password: Pangani dzina lanu ndi nambala yachinsinsi

enroll-in-program.introduction-information: Kuti muthandizike bwino komanso kuti mukhale pandondomeko yabwino, tifuna mbiri yanu
enroll-in-program.please-confirm: Pansipa pali zinthu zokhuza inu. Onani ndipo mupereke

inclusion-status.creating: Mwatipatsa mbiri yanu yokwanila kuti tione ngati mungakhale nawo mu pulogalamu
inclusion-status.inclusion-status-positive: Zikomo chifukwa chakudekha kwanu. Mwayikidwa mu pulogalamu

login-account.incorrect-credentials: Dzina lanu ndi nambala yachinsinsi yomwe mwapanga yakanidwa. Chonde yesaniso
login-account.introduction: Kuti mugwiritse nambala yanu lowetsani dzina lanu ndi nambala yanu yachinsinsi

registration-summary.qr-code: Chonde onetsani nambala iyi pamkumano wanu

select-fsp.introduction: Mutati mwayikidwa mu pologalamu iyi, mungakonde kuti muzilandila bwanji ndalama zanu

set-notification-number.conclusion-skipped: Mwasankha kusasiya foni nambala yanu. Chonde muzilowa pafupipafupi kuti muziona uthenga wina
set-notification-number.conclusion-submitted: Zikomo. Tsopano muzilandila uthenga pa foni nambala iyi {{phone}}
set-notification-number.introduction1: Mutha kufuna kapena ayi kulowetsa foni nambala yanu
set-notification-number.introduction2: Timagwiritsa ichi kukutumizilani uthenga ngati mwayikidwa mu pulogalamu komanso ngati mwalandila ndalama
set-notification-number.introduction3: Ngati simukufuna kuyika nambala yanu ya foni, mukuyenera kulowa apa kuti muone zambiri
set-notification-number.introduction4: Pakutha pandondomeko iyi tizafufuta nambala yanu

validation.phone-number: Tikulephera kupeza foni nambala mwayikayo. Chonde yikaniso ndiye muyeseso

validation.generic-error: Tikulephera kugwiritsa ntchito zina za zomwe mwapereka. Chonde onaniso ndikuyankha ena mwamayankho omwe mukuyenera kupereka
validation.phone-number: Tikulephera kupeza foni nambala mwayikayo. Chonde yikaniso ndiye muyeseso
